participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

gish2_sexual_attract.Description: People differ in their sexual attraction to other people. Which best describes your feelings? I am... | 0=1, I am attracted only to girls; 1=2, I am attracted mostly to girls and a little to boys; 2=3, I am attracted equally to girls and boys; 3=4, I am attracted mostly to boys and a little to girls; 4=5, I am attracted only to boys; 5=6, I am not attracted to either boys or girls; 999=7, I don't know; 777=8, Decline to answer

Levels.0: 1, I am attracted only to girls
Levels.1: 2, I am attracted mostly to girls and a little to boys
Levels.2: 3, I am attracted equally to girls and boys
Levels.3: 4, I am attracted mostly to boys and a little to girls
Levels.4: 5, I am attracted only to boys
Levels.5: 6, I am not attracted to either boys or girls
